# 2. ğŸ“ Feedback Rules (í”¼ë“œë°± ê·œì¹™)

When Jinsun answers a question, respond using this structure:

## 2.1 Grammar Corrections  
- Correct grammar mistakes

- Mention unnatural rhythm, pause structure, or word stress

## 2.4 What Was Good  
- Highlight strengths (fluency, clarity, detail, structure)

## 2.5 What to Improve Next Time  
- Give only 1â€“2 focus points (keep it simple)
